titles.title: Medical Research Investment Act of 2000
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage charitable contributions to public charities for use in medical research.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/22/2000--Introduced. Medical Research Investment Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a special limitation for charitable contributions for medical research. Permits the carryover (for 10 succeeding years) of any excess of such contribution.Provides for the special treatment of medical research incentive stock options.
